name: EPHEMERAL -FANTASY ON DARK-
description: Fleeting, yet beautiful. The world of darkness―― The main protagonist, Cloe (name changeable) lived in a secluded town. Surrounded by wire fences, it felt like she was trapped inside a cage. Zombies were the only residents in that town, and she wasn't the exception.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 or higher, that the video memory is installed more than 256MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: What DirectSound is compatible with
